players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was one of our most trusted members. I think we need to be very careful about who we trust moving forward."
You: "I agree with Bob. Let's be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words. We need to work together as a team to figure out what happened to Charlie."

You: "Let's try to remember any unusual behavior or conversations we may have observed during the night before Charlie was found dead. We should also consider if anyone had a motive or opportunity to harm him."
Diana: "Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the mafioso responsible for Charlie's death. It's important that we expose him before he causes any further harm."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
